title: Besteam
description: Besteam Game is an innovative startup building a football metaverse using NFTs, blockchain, and IoT. Users become virtual footballers with customizable avatars, join teams, and compete in 11vs11 matches bringing real football into the virtual world.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# The Football Metaverse
<!--text-->
Besteam Game s.r.l. is an innovative startup developing a Metaverse and an 11vs11 football role-playing game, built on the Polygon blockchain and based on NFTs. Besteam's goal is to translate real soccer into a virtual experience through blockchain technology.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# User Role
<!--text-->
Each user is a virtual football player with a fully customizable avatar and unique characteristics tailored to specific roles on the field. Users can create their own teams or join existing ones to compete in the Metaverse's main mode: "Football," where they challenge 11 other players with the sole aim of becoming Champion.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Sports Center and BestCity
<!--text-->
Each team has its own "Sports Center," which can be customized and expanded through NFTs and game achievements. This private area is connected to "BestCity," a public space that hosts major competitions. BestCity is an inclusive environment where users can socialize, have fun, earn money, and compete at a professional esports level, fully experiencing the life dynamics of a footballer in a digital setting.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# A Broader Vision
<!--text-->
Our vision goes beyond players: we aim to attract various football-related roles, including agents, managers, match analysts, journalists, and commentators, creating a richer ecosystem within our Metaverse.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Decentralized Economy and Token
<!--text-->
The project is founded on blockchain technology and uses the Polygon network as the base for all internal microtransactions. Tokens are essential for purchasing exclusive avatar customization NFTs, gaining in-game benefits, entering official competitions, and participating in the governance system, allowing major holders to influence project development.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Free-to-Play and Play-to-Earn Model
<!--text-->
The active participation of users and the decentralized economy push the project towards free-to-play and play-to-earn concepts, areas still largely unexplored by major competitors. Besteam aims to recognize and promote virtual players and teams as real esports athletes, enhancing their visibility in the real world.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Opportunities for Real-World Teams
<!--text-->
Real-world football teams can use Besteam's Metaverse to create their own virtual headquarters, engage with their fanbases, and manage administrative and logistical activities. Besteamâ€™s deep-rooted experience in 11vs11 virtual football, coupled with competitors' weaknesses, provides strategic opportunities for building an active and evolving community.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Brand Collaborations and New Market Opportunities
<!--text-->
Besteam introduces a new way of understanding soccer gaming, focused on socialization, competitiveness, and economic gain. Partnerships with brands and companies go beyond simple sponsorships, aiming instead at growth and brand enhancement in a parallel digital market.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Team Experience
<!--text-->
The core concepts of team, community, and aggregation offer a different experience compared to traditional one-on-one gaming. Players are no longer alone: they have rights and responsibilities, share objectives with teammates, and build tangible relationships both on and off the pitch.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Technological Innovation: IoT and Real-World Training
<!--text-->
We are also developing new football accessories using IoT technology, aiming to integrate real-world training with virtual training inside our football Metaverse. Accessories such as smartwatches, boots, goalkeeper gloves, balls, shin guards, and shirts will allow users to train physically and simultaneously improve their avatars' skills and stats in the digital world.
